columns.Station_ID: The unique identifier for each train station.
columns.Name: The official name of the train station.
columns.Annual_entry_exit: The total number of entries and exits per year.
columns.Annual_interchanges: The number of times passengers change trains annually.
columns.Total_Passengers: The total number of passengers using the station yearly.
columns.Location: The city where the train station is situated.
columns.Main_Services: The primary train services operating at the station.
columns.Number_of_Platforms: The total count of platforms available at the station.

station.table_description: The table documents details about train stations and passenger metrics.

columns.Train_ID: The unique identifier for each train.
columns.Name: The official name of the train service.
columns.Time: The scheduled departure time of the train.
columns.Service: The frequency of train service availability.

train.table_description: The table details various trains and their operational schedules.

columns.Train_ID: The unique identifier for each train associated with a station.
columns.Station_ID: The unique identifier for each train station linked to a train.

train_station.table_description: The table connects trains with their respective stations.
